text:
Binary.com I Full-time I Onsite I Malaysia

We are seeking a range of driven, proactive and experienced IT Professionals. This would be an excellent opportunity to work on the core architecture that would drive our high-traffic binary options trading platform.

You should be technically strong, and/or have the passion to perform in any of the following roles:

• DevOps Engineer

• Senior Front-End Developer

• Senior Back-End Developer

• Senior Perl Developer

• Software Tester

• Security Researcher

• Blockchain Developer

• Quality Assurance Engineer

• Quantitative Analyst

Reach out to us directly at hr@binary.com. We would love to hear from you!

To learn more about us: https://www.binary.com/en/careers.html
